{"__typename":"RiskHazardsWithMethod","hazards":[{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Slip and fall/injuries","existingMeasures":"1. Comply with PPE matrix for the task.
2. The work area shall be free from tripping hazards.
3. Team members to identify basket landing area.
4. Non-experience personnel to be briefed and escorted.
5. Land in areas where anti skid is provided on deck.
6. Area to be well illuminated during dark hours.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Basket falls down","existingMeasures":"1. PMS of crane and lifting appliance to be carried out.
2. SSV to be in the vicinity and able to react during personnel transfer by basket.
3. Inspect crane hook safety latch to ensure in good condition.
4. All associated components must be thoroughly inspected by Supply Boat and Ship personnel.
5. Conduct basket dry run prior to carrying out the actual task.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Contact with stationary objects (railings, bulwarks, etc.)","existingMeasures":"1. Anticipate projection and movement of basket prior to lifting. Select path with the least obstruction.
2. Establish proper communication for both voice and signal.
3. Provide tag lines for controlling of basket movement.
4. Personnel on the basket to keep their arms crossed against the basket net at all times.
5. Select a crane with suitable reach for the transfer.
6. Work area to be well- illuminated.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Weather Condition","existingMeasures":"1. Obtain weather forecast and arrange work in acceptable weather condition.
2. Weather and sea conditions to be monitored throughout the task.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":null,"consequence":null,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null}],"methodDescription":"Standard procedures for Personnel Transfer by Transfer Basket"}
